subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees never trailed, but they never built a comfortable lead, instead relying on Severino, who pitched six shutout innings to keep the team a game and a half behind the Blue Jays.
snippet: The Yankees never trailed, but they never built a comfortable lead, instead relying on Severino, who pitched six shutout innings to keep the team a game and a half behind the Blue Jays.
